definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The residents were resettled and church services were held in the Convent.
sentences.chinese: 居民被重新安置和教会服务，被关押在女修道院。

sentences.english: I like convent but I wish they will not admit any women under the age of fifty.
sentences.chinese: 朕喜欢女修道院，其不至收容年龄五十以下之妇人。

sentences.english: At age 43 she became abbess of her community.
sentences.chinese: 43岁时她成为当地的女修道院院长。

sentences.english: The wise old Mother Superior was dying.
sentences.chinese: 睿智的老女修道院长处在了弥留之际。

sentences.english: Fig. 52. The trees behind this convent were done on wet on wet watercolor paper.
sentences.chinese: 女修道院后的树是绘在湿性水彩画纸上的。

sentences.english: She was bunked from the convent last term .
sentences.chinese: 她上个学期从女修道院逃跑了。

sentences.english: She bunked from the convent last term.
sentences.chinese: 她上学期从女修道院逃跑了。

sentences.english: For years and years she lived here the way you would live in a convent.
sentences.chinese: 她年复一年地住在这里，就像你住在女修道院一样。

definition: nun or sister (of the Roman Catholic or Greek Orthodox churches)
